ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.Page

  • public class Page
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a physical page of a story -- it is part of the model of the application. Page objects are aggregated by Storys and are serialized and stored through a Handler implementation.
    Author:
    all group members

    • Constructor Detail

      • Page

        public Page()
        This is the constructor that binds the arraylists to itself

      • Page

        public Page(java.lang.String enterAnything)
        This is a special constructor that initializes a null page. It only exists within the Page selector of a decision This exists as a vessel for random stories. When the Controller encounters this special Page, it will redirect the player through a random choice.
        Parameters:
        enterAnything -
